content: this legal text provides an overview of a legal case without mentioning the names of the parties involved the case lasted for four years and involved an amount of 2304296 euros the tribunal made a final ruling dissolving the community inheritance between the parties and assigning the property to the plaintiff the plaintiff is obligated to pay certain sums to the coheirs and the defendants have been ordered to pay the plaintiffs legal costs the courtappointed expert witness reported construction irregularities and depreciation of the property making it impossible to divide the court determined the probable sale value of the property and calculated individual shares for the parties the defendants objections were disregarded and adjustments were made in favor of certain parties the defendants demand for restitution of alleged improvements was denied and they were ordered to pay compensation the costs of the litigation were to be borne by certain parties and the courtappointed expert witness expenses were to be shared by the defendants the ruling was made on january 30 2020 by judge dr pam
